ygData.subject: Re: Survey Results
ygData.msgSnippet: You will not see any advantages at first, but you will eventually be able to max your skills.  I find myself at level 31 still having time between levels to
ygData.messageBody:
You will not see any advantages at first, but you will eventually be able to
max your skills. I find myself at level 31 still having time between levels
to complete capping other weapon proficiencies. I never started training
duel weild until level 27, capped it at level 30. I am only 2 and a half
bubble through level 31 and have both 2hs and 1hs as well as all my
"unthinking" skills capped. I think with a little bit of time, you will cap
yours as well.

As far as them doing something about it, who knows. At least if we do the
feedback, we can say we tried. Nothing ventured nothing gained as the old
addage goes.

Dyvim Kinciad
Stormriders of Cazic Thule

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Zwanenburg, John [mailto:ZWANENJ@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 12:22 PM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Survey Results
>
>
> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
> Hrm,
>
> Even tho im totally fed up with this thread ill do one last post on the
> matter.
>
> it seems to me that we arent the first to try and run these ideas
> by verant.
> I know they like user feedback but i seriously doubt they will implement
> either of those ideas. I mean how are they going to make up for a level 50
> warrior (ir 43 in my case) Are they just going to BOOM all my
> skills are up
> and stuff? I dont think so. I hate to say this folks but your ideas arent
> going to get past the drawing board.
>
> P.S They are good ideas tho , dont get me wrong.
>
> Lothaniel/Rayne
>
> > ----------
> > From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 1:52 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: [warriors_eq] Survey Results
> >
> > From: Patricia Halas <patty_halas@...>
> >
> > Gentlemen and ladies,
> >
> > The final recommendation from warriors_eq@onelist.com (128 members)
> > is two
> > enhancements for the warrior class:
> >
> > 1) Increase the cap on combat abilities (1H slashing, 2H slashing,
> > dodge,
> > parry, riposte, dual wield, double attack) from 200 to 255.
> >
> > 2) Allow weapon skill specialization along the same lines as magic
> > users.
> > This would allow a warrior to specialize in one type of weapon
> for reduced
> >
> > delay and increased damage.
> >
> > Please include this as feedback every night for the next few weeks while
> > you
> > play the game. Post it on any and all message boards you can find and
> > pass
> > it on to your friends. Let's send the same message to Verant,
> if they see
> > a
> > large number of people with the same suggested improvements
> they may just
> > make it happen.
> >
> >
> > For the Honor and or May the blessings of
> > Glory of Rallos Zek; Tunare be with you;
> >
> > Patty of Halas Patty Treehugger
> > Barbarian Warrior Princess Half Elf Ranger
> > username: Patricia username: Patty
> > server: Bristlebane server: Bristlebane
> >
